alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 04 at 1:42PM MST until January 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West and northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. Periods of snow and blowing snow could also lower visibility and make roads slick. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. This includes I-80 across portions of southern Wyoming. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous, as the combination of wind and snow could greatly reduce visibility and increase the blowover risk.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
